entry.title: Russia Strikes Residential, Business District in Central Ukraine, Killing 17
entry.content: The strike on the city of Vinnytsia, far from the front lines in Ukraine, comes as Moscow appears to be doubling down on long-range missile attacks and airstrikes.

entry.title: Sri Lanka's President Misses Resignation Deadline
entry.content: The parliamentary speaker had said the president would resign on July 13, but President Gotabaya Rajapaksa left the country in the early hours of that day.

entry.title: 12 Hours of Misery at One of the World's Busiest Airports
entry.content: A recent day at London’s Heathrow Airport saw hundreds of delayed flights, lines of travelers spilling into each other and a mysteriously closed lost-luggage desk. “This is the new normal.”
